oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Brother Theodore Drahmann Speaks at Academic Podium
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: De La Salle Christian Brothers; Presidents; Podiums
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Standing in front of an image of St. John Baptist De La Salle, President Brother Theodore Drahmann delivered a speech at Academic Podium, a lecture series sponsored by Christian Brothers College.
